summary: Backend testing of AI-powered Price Suggestion feature completed. All 11 tests passed (100% success rate). Price suggestions work correctly with Claude Sonnet 4.5 AI generating smart pricing recommendations.
critical_code_review_comments: Price suggestion API properly checks enable_price_suggestions admin setting before processing
AI uses Claude Sonnet 4.5 for generating price recommendations with reasoning and tips
Fallback mechanism works correctly when no market data is available
Response structure includes all required fields: min_price, max_price, recommended_price, currency, confidence, reasoning, tip, based_on_listings
Price logic validated: min_price <= recommended_price <= max_price
seed_data_creation: None - Tests use test product details
context_for_next_testing_agent: Price suggestion feature fully implemented and tested. The endpoint POST /api/ai-analyzer/price-suggestion accepts category, subcategory, brand, model, condition, detected_features, and user_id. Returns price_suggestion with min/max/recommended prices, reasoning, tip, and based_on_listings count. Admin can enable/disable via enable_price_suggestions setting.

POST /api/ai-analyzer/price-suggestion.description: Returns AI-generated price suggestions with min, max, recommended prices

Price suggestion includes reasoning and.description: AI provides meaningful reasoning explaining price logic and actionable tips for sellers

Price suggestion works without market da.description: When no similar listings found in database, AI still provides reasonable price estimates based on product knowledge

Price suggestions respect admin enable/d.description: When enable_price_suggestions=false, API returns {success: false, error: 'Price suggestions are disabled by admin'}

GET /api/ai-analyzer/admin/settings show.description: Settings endpoint includes enable_price_suggestions boolean field (currently true)

mocked_apis.notes: Real AI using Claude Sonnet 4.5 via Emergent LLM key - actual AI generation working

price_suggestion.reasoning: The Samsung Galaxy S21 128GB in good condition typically retails for 40-50% of its original launch price (~€849)...
price_suggestion.tip: Price at €299-€315 to attract buyers quickly. Highlight 5G capability and include clear photos...
